title: Gyaarah Gyaarah
overview: Three cops defy the rules of time to investigate and deliver justice in a series of cold cases. How far will they go as they work from within the corrupt system to bring the criminals to book?

tv.episodeOverview: In 1990, a child gets abused by his mother, unravelling patterns of the 'Tie and Die' killerâ€™s method. In 2016, Vamika's search leads her to a hospital room only to find Brahmdutt's son, Birju. A trail of attacks follows.
